description: Biased data, results in biased decision-making. Making sure that at every step of the data lifecycle, we make conscious attempts to debias the data is an important responsibility for all data scientists. In this talk, I highlight the typical data lifecycle, and how to prevent biases at every step. ---- The key takeaways from my talk include: 1) Understanding the data lifecycle 2) What are the typical ways biases creep in 3) How we can proactively prevent and fix biases in data
title: Debiasing the Data Lifecycle
